segments.text: I need help picking out a lotion .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It would be my pleasure to help you . What do you need help with ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I picked up some poison oak while hiking , and I can â€™ t stop itching .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We have Techne , and it is available in lotion or cream .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you find that one works better than the other ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have heard that the cream is longer lasting .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is there anything I can take that will help with the itching ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If you take an antihistamine , that would help a lot .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you for helping me figure out what to do with my poison oak .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It was a pleasure . Come back anytime .
segments.speaker: S2
